Ivan Flores

Hey, I'm Ivan Flores, a Computer Science Junior at California State University, Fullerton. My goal is to be a Big Data Engineer, and I'm actively working towards that goal by interning with the Internal Services Department at LA County. Within my role as an intern, I am immersed with the development and documentation of two software solutions. Leading the back-end development and database design of a county wide web application has been really insigtful and tooling. I believe designing and implementing such solutions that support client needs and requests has given me a solid foundation of experience and value to carry over to my next data venture. Let's connect and talk about how we can work together!
